name: 5th Edition of International Cancer Conference - 2022
content: The congress strives to provide a meaningful theme of “Combating Cancer with Novel Paradigm in Oncology Research.” Patients with cancer and their needs are at the centre of all we do, and we're dedicated to improving research and integrating it into the clinic to provide better treatment for them. We intend to provide a full comprehensive summary of all practice-changing new data, as well as a clear path to the clinic.
